pageContext.claim: “I ask Senator Chuck Schumer, why didn’t President Obama & the Democrats do something about Trade with China, including Theft of Intellectual Property etc.? They did NOTHING! With that being said, Chuck & I have long agreed on this issue! Fair Trade, plus, with China will happen!”
pageContext.analysis: President Trump may disagree with the trade tactics that the Obama administration used, but to say that they "did nothing" isn't accurate. The Trans-Pacific Partnership (which Trump withdrew from in early 2017) included measures that would have required the Chinese to change certain practices in order to join. The Trump administration has continued to enforce an Obama-era agreement on hacking which included theft of intellectual property.
